Josephine Delphine Henderson Heard (11 Ọktoba, 1861 - 21 Ọktoba, 1924) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede abụ na onye nkuzi.
A mụrụ Josie Henderson na Ọktoba 11, 1861
Ọ bụ nwa nne na nna abụọ bụ ndị ohu, Lafayette na Annie Henderson na Salisbury, North Carolina
Mgbe ịgba ohu biri, e setịpụrụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ maka ya ịghọ onye nkụzi
Ọ lụrụ William Henry Heard na Jenụwarị 21, 1882. O nwere ọkwa nkuzi n'ọtụtụ obodo ka ya na di ya na-eme njem, onye ama ama na AME Church
A na-egosipụta ọṅụ ya n'ịkụzi ihe na mbido nke mpịakọta uri ya nke afọ 1890 nke akpọrọ Morning Glories
O dere site n'obi nke na-achọ ịgba ndị ntorobịa nke agbụrụ ahụ ume ma kpalie ha.” Ọrụ ahụ nwere abụ iri asaa na abụọ mbụ ya
E degharịrị ya ma gbasaa ya n'afọ 1891

Di ya dere n'akwụkwọ ncheta ya, "Ọ bụ onye ọkà mmụta na onye na-ede abụ, na ojiji o ji asụsụ Bekee eme ihe, yana nkatọ nke okwuchukwu m, emeela ọtụtụ ihe n'ime ka m bụrụ onye nkwusa ha na-ekwu na m bụ
Ọ nwụrụ na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, n'afọ 1924 n'ihi ọrịa kansa ara.
Abụ ya Heard "Black Sampson" dị ka gụnyere na anthology She Wields a Pen: American Women Poets of the Nineteenth Century nke Janet Gray deziri.
